[Barracks Hall] Lyria moves north to Barracks Hall. Sees: Finn.
[Barracks Hall] Lyria tells Finn: ""What have you discovered here? The guard Marcus spoke of goblins fleeing from something deeper in the fortress.""

[Barracks Hall] Finn tells Lyria: ""Cleared two goblins here with Kael. Marcus was right - they were fleeing something deeper down. North leads to the fortress depths, east continues this level. I ...
[Collapsed Library] Finn moves east to Collapsed Library. Enemies: Dust Wraith.
[Collapsed Library] Finn attacks Dust Wraith for 4 damage. (Dust Wraith HP: 3/7) Dust Wraith retaliates against Finn for 1 damage. (Finn HP: 9/12)
[Collapsed Library] Finn attacks Dust Wraith for 4 damage. (Dust Wraith HP: 0/7) Dust Wraith is slain! Loot dropped: Arcane Focus.
[Collapsed Library] Finn picks up Arcane Focus. Equipped as ring (MDMG:6).
[Barracks Hall] Finn moves west to Barracks Hall.
[Barracks Hall] No one named 'lyria' here.
[Central Corridor] Finn moves north to Central Corridor. Sees: Lyria.

[Central Corridor] Lyria tells Finn: ""Where is Kael? We should regroup before proceeding deeper - the fortress depths to the north likely hold greater dangers than what we've faced so far."" Finn ...
[Central Corridor] Finn tells Lyria: ""Kael's still back at the barracks - room 4 to the south. Should we fetch him before heading north to the depths?""
[Barracks Hall] Lyria moves south to Barracks Hall. Finn moves south to Barracks Hall. Sees: Lyria.
